mapper.select: select a.* ,b.type_name serviceCategory from tb_service a LEFT JOIN tb_service_type b on b.id=a.service_type_id limit #{start},#{pageSize}
select count(A.id) from ( select a.* ,b.type_name serviceCategory from tb_service a LEFT JOIN tb_service_type b on b.id=a.service_type_id)A
select a.* ,b.type_name serviceCategory from tb_service a INNER JOIN tb_service_type b on b.id=a.service_type_id where a.id = #{id}
SELECT count(*) FROM tb_service_relation r LEFT JOIN tb_service_type t ON r.service_type_id=t.id LEFT JOIN tb_service s ON s.service_type_id = t.id WHERE r.company_id=#{companyId} AND r.state='审核通过'
mapper.update: update tb_service set unit_price = #{unitPrice} where id = #{id}
